root.name: Judge Dredd: Countdown Sector 106
root.description: GameplayJudge Dredd: Countdown Sector 106 is a "Gamebook", a term coined by Tin Man Games to describe the mix of a text adventure novel and a dice rolling game. Gameplay consists of the player being presented with a multitude of options to choose from that will continue the story. At times you will initiate combat with "perps", and perform different types of dice rolls to determine your success or failure.
